name: The Lonliness Gallery
description:
The Loneliness Gallery

The Loneliness Gallery is a walking simulator of exploring a gallery like place. It has a similar interior look to an ordinary gallery and provides different showrooms for players to explore. Each showroom s hows one aspect of loneliness by interpreting and visualising this feeling in various ways. The puzzle theme asks the player to walk through every room and piece them up to find out what happens in the end. The idea of this level comes from the quarantine for COVID 19. Many people suffer mental health impacts from isolated life. This level provides an experience for players to pay closer attention to their emotions. In the loneliness gallery, a player is not only an audience of the exhibition but also becom es a part of the loneliness show.
